You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &bnot;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&bNot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2aed/index.htm U+02AED].
  * `&bnot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2310/index.htm U+02310].
